price: (13) Then We placed him as a sperm-drop[949] in a firm lodging [i.e., the womb].
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnāhu nuṭ'fatan fī qarārin makīnin
